function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus mutation challenges vaccine development","Impact":"Increased difficulty in creating effective vaccines","Mitigation":"Continuous research and development to adapt to virus mutations","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing and antigenic characterization","People":"Vaccine developers, researchers, and medical organizations","Owner":"Research and development teams and medical organizations"},{"Description":"Long timeline for commercial release of vaccines","Impact":"Delay in putting an end to the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Streamlining clinical trials and regulatory processes, accelerating manufacturing","Technologies":"Clinical trial management systems, fast-track regulatory pathways","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, healthcare organizations, and vaccine manufacturers"}]}
